name: ferkathas-5e
title: Ferkathas (D&D)
description:
THE YEAR IS 1537 VIRYAN AGE, MONTH FIREWANE.

And the world is calling your name.

FIVE CONTINENTS STIR.

Never mind the other thirteen main planes of existence, you will never finish all the adventures offered just in these lands. From unjust slave trades to brewing wars to desperate aftermaths to brooding dragons, each has something to offer.
